Example of a general input parameter files for Gromacs 5. For comparison of the different .mdp options see:

- **D.H. de Jong, S. Baoukina, H.I. Ing√≥lfsson, Marrink S.J.** Martini straight: boosting performance using a shorter cutoff and GPUs. Comput. Phys. Commun., 199:1-7, 2016. [doi:10.1016/j.cpc.2015.09.014](http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0010465515003628)

Based on the extensive testing, we recommend the new-rf.mdp parameters for most cases. However not all systems have been tested and we recommend you do your own tests. In addition, for consistency within a project the same .mdp options should always be used.
